trans-unit.source: Implements a markup extension that enables application authors to customize control styles based on the current system theme.
trans-unit.target: 實作標記延伸，可讓自訂控制項樣式的應用程式作者根據目前的系統主題。

trans-unit.source: This class is a markup extension implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是標記延伸實作。

trans-unit.source: Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code.
trans-unit.target: 標記延伸類別存在目的主要是為了提供某種程度的基礎結構支援[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器實作和標記延伸所公開的成員不通常稱為從使用者程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This extension supports the [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此延伸模組支援[ThemeDictionary 標記延伸](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)使用方式從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](../Topic/ThemeDictionary%20Markup%20Extension.md).
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字使用對於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[ThemeDictionary 標記延伸](../Topic/ThemeDictionary%20Markup%20Extension.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension"></xref> class, using the specified assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension"></xref>類別，使用指定的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The assembly name string.
trans-unit.target: 組件名稱字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string setting a particular naming convention to identify which dictionary applies for a particular theme.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，設定特定的命名慣例，來識別哪一個字典適用於特定主題。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字使用對於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[ThemeDictionary 標記延伸](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The assembly name string.
trans-unit.target: 組件名稱字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.
trans-unit.target: 傳回應該設定於套用這個延伸的屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: For <xref href="System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension"></xref>, this is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value for a particular theme dictionary extension.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref href="System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension"> </xref>，這是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]特定佈景主題字典延伸的值。

trans-unit.source: This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法支援[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器實作並不是直接呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `ThemeResourceDictionary` extension values during object creation.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器實作會使用這個方法的適當處理`ThemeResourceDictionary`期間建立物件的擴充功能值。

trans-unit.source: This implementation relies on services based on the passed `serviceProvider`.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作依賴服務傳遞`serviceProvider`。

trans-unit.source: It must not be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 它不得為`null`。

trans-unit.source: The `serviceProvider` object is expected to implement <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IXamlTypeResolver>.
trans-unit.target: `serviceProvider`物件必須是實作<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IXamlTypeResolver>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IXamlTypeResolver>

trans-unit.source: An object that can provide services for the markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 物件，可以為標記延伸提供服務。

trans-unit.source: This service is expected to provide results for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IXamlTypeResolver>.
trans-unit.target: 此服務必須為<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IXamlTypeResolver>。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IXamlTypeResolver>提供結果

trans-unit.source: The object value to set on the property where the extension is applied.
trans-unit.target: 要在套用延伸的屬性上設定的物件值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension.AssemblyName*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension.AssemblyName*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension.AssemblyName*>

trans-unit.source: You must set this value during construction or before using the ProvideValue method.
trans-unit.target: 在建構期間或使用 ProvideValue 方法之前，您必須將此值。

trans-unit.source: -or- serviceProvider is or does not provide a service for .
trans-unit.target: - serviceProvide 或未提供.的服務

trans-unit.source: -or- serviceProvider specifies a target type that does not match <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - serviceProvider 指定不符合目標類型<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。
